issue.title: Autocomplete search function
issue.body:
**Original author :** Portier Thomas

There is two ways to implement this function : 
- Implement an indexer in EasySDI for each search field and for each context of catalog : very complicated and a lot of work but very efficient (possibility to manage rights?)
- Implement a JOOMLA finder plugin that will index all the published ressources name with link to the metadata sheet : very simple to implement, can't manage rights but integrated with the others JOOMLA components ([[http://docs.joomla.org/Creating_a_Smart_Search_plug-in]])

These two functions are complementary.
